title: Is it true that before Alcohol was prohibited, Ali ibn Abi Talib lead a prayer while being drunk?
transcript: faisal says i'm faisal from bangladesh and my question is i heard that there is a hadith saying that before drinking wine was prohibited I did never be parted may Allah be pleased with him leading the Jumeirah of our or motherland while we was drunk and mistakenly recites some wrong lines from surah to Katherine is this authentic sahih hadith that man says no this is fabricated and it's not authentic
